description: Ms. composite codex. Title from fol. 1a. Incip. text 1: ... الحمد لله ... فىقول ... الرشتى ان بعض الدىانىن الذىن مىّزوا
contents: 1. fol. 1b-125a: [Jawāb masāʼil] / Kāẓim ibn Qāsim al-Ḥusaynī al-Rashtī. 3 Jumādá I, 1264H, Mīrzā Khalīl Askavī (?)
2. fol. 127b-157b: [Persian translation of Risālat al-sulūk fī al-akhlāq wa-al-aʻmāl] / Kāẓim ibn Qāsim al-Ḥusaynī al-Rashtī.
3. fol. 158a-163b: [Risālah dar masāʾil-i uṣūl-i dīn] / Ḥusayn ibn ʻAlī Tabrīzī Khusrūshāhī. Incomplete at end.
4. fol. 164a-178a: [Fragment of a text on doctrine in Persian].
extent: 179 leaves : paper ; 216 x 159 mm. bound to 216 x 162 mm.

title.@value: Jawāb al-masāʾil lil-Sayyid Kāẓim al-Rashtī wa-risālah ukhrá bi-al-Fārisīyah
